de.iabg.j3d
Class DrawingCanvas3D

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Canvas
          javax.media.j3d.Canvas3D
              de.iabg.j3d.DrawingCanvas3D
All Implemented Interfaces:
Renderer, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class DrawingCanvas3D
extends javax.media.j3d.Canvas3D
implements Renderer

This implementation of a Renderer provides default functionality to displace a Java3D scene. Typically, The creation of just one Java3D scene requires many classes on both the scene branch and view branch sides. This class creates a reusable object that acts as the entire view branch. Java3D already has a simplified class, the SimpleUniverse, however, it still requires some basic functionality such as mouse behaviors and is not itself designed to handle user-defined events. This implementation attempts to further simplify the SimpleUniverse and allow a Swing component to drive which objects are rendered and when they are rendered.

Version:
September 10, 2008
Author:
Adam C. Dick, BSE
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

DrawingCanvas3D

public DrawingCanvas3D()
Constructs a DrawingCanvas3D and instantiates the SimpleUniverse and list of Renderable objects. It also sets the default background color to black before calling installScene(), which installs all the necessary components to create a legitimate Java3D scene with modular content.

initialize

protected void initialize()
This method does nothing since there are no initialization tasks.

installBehaviors

protected void installBehaviors()
Installs a standard orbital behavior that allows paning, rotating, and zooming.

installContentBranchGraph

protected void installContentBranchGraph()
Installs an empty scene branch group to create a live scene. A reference to this scene branch group is stored and its capabilities are set such that children can be added or removed.

installLayout

protected void installLayout()
Installs a preferred canvas size of 512 by 512 pixels.

installListeners

protected void installListeners()
Instantiates a SceneListener, which can later be attached to Renderable objects.

installScene

protected void installScene()
Installs all the necessary components of a Java3D scene. The concept and structure of the method calls are conceived from a typical Swing user interface.

installViewBranchGraph

protected void installViewBranchGraph()
Creates a reference to the ViewingPlatform of the SimpleUniverse and sets a nominal view.
